page.title: 04WEEK DAY,CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: {A WEEK DAY IN THE LIFE OF THE KNOX {FAMILY, CAREW. } The day starts at 6.15am when dad gets up.Mum follows at 6.30am. She prepares their breakfast and cuts sandwiches for dad's lunch.He leaves for work as a H.G.V.driver at 6.45am. At 7.15am mum wakes my sister who catches the 8.10am bus to Greenhill Comprehensive School.Mum calls me.I have my breakfast and leave for school on my bike at 9.00am.After doing the housework mum goes to work at 9.30am. I return home at 3.30pm,my sister at 4.15pm.While mum prepares tea I do my homework,change,then go out to play.By 5.15pm dad is home and we all sit down for tea together. Most evenings the family watches T.V. On Fridays I go to Scouts and later to Carew Youth Club.We children go to bed at 10.00pm,mum & dad at 11.00pm.
